Class IDCode

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.bitstream.IDCode

  • public class IDCode
extends Object
    Keeps track of all device IDCodes.
    Since:
    2020.2.1

    • Method Detail

      • createIDCode

        public static int createIDCode(int devIDCode,
                               int revision)
        For a given ID code, modify it based on the silicon revision
        Parameters:
        devIDCode - Existing ID code
        revision - Silicon revision (1, meaning rev1 etc)
        Returns:
        The newly created ID code
        Since:
        2020.2.1

      • getIDCode

        public static Integer getIDCode(Device device)
        Gets the unique device ID code
        Parameters:
        device - The device of interest
        Returns:
        Gets the unique ID code for the provided device or null if none is found
        Since:
        2020.2.1

      • getIDCode

        public static Integer getIDCode(Device device,
                                int slrConfigIndex)
        Gets the ID code for devices with multi SLRs.
        Parameters:
        device - The device of interest
        slrConfigIndex - The configuration order index of the SLR of interest
        Returns:
        device SLR-specifc ID code
        Since:
        2020.2.1

      • getIDCode

        public static Integer getIDCode(String partName)
        Gets the unique device ID code
        Parameters:
        partName - The name of a part
        Returns:
        Gets the unique ID code for the provided part or null if none is found
        Since:
        2020.2.1
